Yehova ndiye mfumu; mitundu ya anthu injenjemere;Iye akhala pakati pa akerubi; dziko lapansi ligwedezeke.
Yehova ndiye wamkulu m'Ziyoni;ndipo akwezeka pamwamba pa mitundu yonse ya anthu.
Alemekeze dzina lanu lalikulu ndi loopsa.Ili ndilo loyera.
Ndipo mphamvu ya mfumu ikonda chiweruzo;Inu mukhazikitsa zolunjika,muchita chiweruzo ndi chilungamo m'Yakobo.
Mkwezeni Yehova Mulungu wathu,ndipo gwadirani poponderapo mapazi ake:Iye ndiye Woyera.
Mwa ansembe ake muli Mose ndi Aroni,ndi Samuele mwa iwo akuitanira dzina lake;anaitana kwa Yehova, ndipo Iye anawayankha.
Iye analankhula nao mu mtambo woti njo:Iwo anasunga mboni zake ndi malembawa anawapatsa.
Munawayankha, Yehova Mulungu wathu:munawakhalira Mulungu wakuwakhululukira,mungakhale munabwezera chilango pa zochita zao.
Mkwezeni Yehova Mulungu wathu,ndipo gwadirani pa phiri lake loyera;pakuti Yehova Mulungu wathu ndiye woyera.
